name: Ymacs
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body:
# [Ymacs](http://www.ymacs.org/) + [Filepicker.io](https://www.filepicker.io) = One more reason you can do everything online.
You know what's awesome? Emacs. You know what's even more awesome? Emacs in the browser (Ymacs). You know what's even awesomer? Emacs in the browser where you can directly edit files from Dropbox, Github, Gdrive, and all the rest.

Oh yeah, it's entirely client-side javascript - no server needed.
